channel.title: Juggle Php Phone Blogs War Juggling Corporate Matiss Nokia Blogger on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Juggle Php Phone Blogs War Juggling Corporate Matiss Nokia Blogger on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: i am incredibly tired.
item.description: i feel better. even matt said I looked and acted more chilled out. I really feel more chilled out. morgan and I talked and came to a point where we are in the same space/place. I think it will work out. we obviously have to redefine our relationship. and how we work together. but that is totally fine and completely appropriate. I think she said it best with an analogy to the gears in a car.
